attributes.action: give Prof. Steven Hawking a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: prof. hawking has been at the top of his field for 30 years and is a major part of the scientif community. his work in cosmology has helped in all aspects of science.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
